text: Corentin Moutet was the defending champion but chose not to defend his title. Ugo Humbert won the title after defeating Denis Istomin 6–2, 6–2 in the final. ==Seeds== All seeds receive a bye into the second round. ==Draw== ===Finals=== ===Top half=== ====Section 1==== ====Section 2==== ===Bottom half=== ====Section 3==== ====Section 4==== ==References== *Main Draw Amex-Istabul Challenger - Singles 2019 Singles
title: 2019 Amex-Istanbul Challenger – Singles
